skillTree.name: Dorghar
skillTree.description: Dorghar is the Steed of the Apocalypse, a gift from the Chaos Gods themselves to their ultimate champion.

skillTree.name: The Swords of Chaos
skillTree.description: The Swords of Chaos are Archaon's warband, a cadre of hardened companions that have been forged over many dread quests.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +25% for Chaos Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Chaos Knights
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -10% for Chaos Knight units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Lord of the End Times
skillTree.description: Archaon is Lord of the End Times, crowned by Be'lakor, a creature of abeyance that's neither shape nor shadow.

effects.description:
Unit capacity: +1
	Khorne Berzerkers, Guardians of Dark Prince Desires, Zealots of Change and Sons of the Last Plague

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

effects.description:
Unit capacity: +1
	Khorne Berzerkers, Guardians of Dark Prince Desires, Zealots of Change and Sons of the Last Plague

skillTree.name: Chosen of the Gods
skillTree.description: "I am no god's tool, yet I am Chosen, for there is no other that thirsts for the end as much as I."

skillTree.name: Hearts of Iron
skillTree.description: The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.

skillTree.name: Aura of Chaos
skillTree.description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

skillTree.name: The Grand Marshal of Chaos
skillTree.description: Only the very best candidates may serve at the right-hand of the Everchosen.

effects.description:
[HIDDEN - do not translate] Used to increase lord rank when replacing a lord (target the effect at forces factionwide) - use in conjunction with a shown effect that targets provinces factionwide
	(own armies factionwide)

skillTree.name: Abyss-Forged Armour
skillTree.description: Blacker than black and far harder than any armour ever forged by mortal-hand, there is... something of the abyss about those who wear it.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Chaos Warrior units
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -25% for Chaos Warrior units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: The Chosen Ones
skillTree.description: To fight in Archaon's army, you *must* bear the Mark.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 10% for Chaos Chosen units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Chaos Chosen units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Aspiring Champion units
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: +5% for Aspiring Champion units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Knights of the Herald
skillTree.description: Archaon is truly the Herald of the Apocalypse, blessed with dreadful artefacts and even more dreadful minions, whose only purpose is to bring about the End Times.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +25% for Chaos Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Chaos Knights units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Distinguished Champions
skillTree.description: The Everchosen stirs from his dark throne and prepares the blow that shall split the world asunder; these Heroes - who once were men - shall be his sword.

effects.description:
Hero recruit rank: +4 for Exalted Heroes
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ascension to Daemonhood
skillTree.description: "And wherever they tread, the ground will blacken. And what they touch will wither to dust and blow away."

skillTree.name: Despoiler
skillTree.description: I seek only to weaken the Dark Gods, to shake their hold upon the future. No other course remains; not to mortals, nor the Divine.

skillTree.name: Will of the Gods
skillTree.description: My will is eternal and the Chaos Gods are pleased by it!

effects.description:
Leadership aura size: -50%
	(enemy characters in region)

Leadership aura size: +100% (when attacking)
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.name: Eye of the Gods
skillTree.description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

skillTree.name: Diviner
skillTree.description: This adept uses the Winds of Magic to seek out arcane artefacts.

effects.description:
Magic item drop chance: +10%
	(all characters factionwide)

skillTree.name: Dominating Presence
skillTree.description: A Chaos Lord dominates â€“ lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

skillTree.name: Chaos Vanguard
skillTree.description: To the Northmen, there is no greater honour than to fight and perish under the gaze of the Gods.

skillTree.description: Khorneâ€™s will imbues his creatures with a vicious, unslakeable hunger for battle.

skillTree.name: Blessed by Chaos
skillTree.description: Unnatural strength, an aura of dark menace, an unwavering devotion to the Chaos Gods â€“ some warriors have undoubtedly been touched by the Ruinous Ones.

skillTree.name: Hammer into Anvil
skillTree.description: Breaking bones and ending lives, the armies of Chaos strike like an unholy hammer crashing through their enemies' ranks.

skillTree.name: Monstrous Strength
skillTree.description: Hulks of pure muscle, held upright by unsullied hatred, can crush a man with a frightening lack of effort.

skillTree.name: Doomfire
skillTree.description: Doomfire is a gift from Khorne, to ensure the Hellcannons speak with extra fury.

skillTree.name: Legion of Doom
skillTree.description: The legions march forth under the Lord's inscrutable gaze, eager to kill for fear of his wrath.

skillTree.name: Speed & Malice
skillTree.description: The worthiest of Chaos' vanguard are blessed with the most elaborate mutations, which also enable them to run faster for longer.

skillTree.name: Freakish Mutations
skillTree.description: Mutations awarded by the Chaos Gods to their followers may look horrific to southerners, but such gifts are prized.

skillTree.name: Guided by Tzeentch
skillTree.description: Impossible foresight is granted to a few among the ranks of the Ruinous armies, allowing them to land the critical blow upon their foes.

Reload time reduction: +10% for Hellcannon, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Despoilers
skillTree.description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.

skillTree.name: Serve or Die
skillTree.description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

skillTree.name: Tribes of Chaos
skillTree.description: A Lord that was once part of the tribes - one who rode the great Norscan migrations - can summon his kin.

skillTree.name: Ruination
skillTree.description: "This stinking mortal Hold will fall, my masters have foreseen it. Bring them ruin!"

skillTree.name: Unholy Resilience
skillTree.description: This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Dark Apothecary
skillTree.description: The Dark Apothecaries mix their fell unguents, ensuring those that can continue to serve.

skillTree.name: Gathering of Might
skillTree.description: The masses flock to the Lord of Chaos - a dread time will soon fall on the weaklings in the south.

skillTree.name: Premonition
skillTree.description: This being must be touched by Tzeentch, seeing things before they happen.

skillTree.name: Corruption
skillTree.description: With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption - as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.

backgroundSkills.name: Vessel
backgroundSkills.description: "I will be the axis upon which the wheel of change turns, and the world will drown in the light of unborn stars."

factionEffects.title: Everchosen
factionEffects.description: Archaon the Everchosen is the Lord of the End Times, the vessel through which the Dark Gods unite their followers and turn the whole world into a Realm of Chaos.

effects.description: gives RoR's the benefits of archaons unique +3% damage per rank effect, because they don't have ranks.
Units gain +2% weapon and missile strength per rank achieved
Recruitment cost: -30% for Chaos Warrior units
Physical resistance: 10% for Chaos Knights units
Melee attack and leadership: +10 for Chaos Cultists units
Can raise Chaos Fortresses in every major settlement
Main income source: settlements and horde buildings
